content.yext/answer: No. There is no personal guarantee requirement. ***However, if the proceeds are used for fraudulent purposes, the U.S. government will pursue criminal charges against you.***
content.yext/name: Do I need to personally guarantee this loan?
content.yext/question: Do I need to personally guarantee this loan?

content.yext/answer: Nein, es besteht keine persönliche Garantie. *** Wenn der Erlös jedoch für betrügerische Zwecke verwendet wird, wird die US-Regierung Strafanzeigen gegen Sie erheben. ***

No. Non esiste alcun requisito di garanzia personale. *** Tuttavia, se i proventi vengono utilizzati a fini fraudolenti, il governo degli Stati Uniti perseguirà accuse penali nei tuoi confronti. ***
